verbs.description: [ARG0: supporters and detractors] [V: voice] [ARG1: their opinion on cmp corridor a hearing on central maine power proposal to build a new transmission line corridor in western maine one that would carry electricity produced in canada down to massachusetts] it drew lots of supporters and detractors- all of whom got to say their piece sue ely john carroll puc peter dostie maine new england clifford stevens kennebec river cmp corridor natural resources council public utilities commission cmp
